New Records: Patrick Dorgu scored a debut goal for Denmark in the Nations League A Group 4 clash against Switzerland
Key Match Events: Nico Elvedi was given a red card for upending Kasper Dolberg after a VAR review
Granit Xhaka was dismissed in the 87th minute after picking up his second yellow card
Patrick Dorgu scored a minute after coming off the bench for his debut
Pierre Emil Hojbjerg wrapped up the victory with a stoppage-time goal
Post-Match Reflections: Danish captain Pierre Emil Hojbjerg praised his team's performance saying they 'wrapped up the victory with a stoppage-time goal'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Parken Stadium in Copenhagen, Denmark with an attendance of 26,024
The result left Denmark top of the group after a scoreless draw between Spain and Serbia
Others: The match was part of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League, Group Stage
